sentences.sContent: In just 50 weeks Dan tried everything from being a lobster catcher, a jazz conductor, a TV weatherman and even a Las Vegas wedding planner.
sentences.sContent_eng: In just 50 weeks Dan tried everything from being a lobster catcher, a jazz conductor, a TV weatherman and even a Las Vegas wedding planner.
sentences.sCn: 于是在50个礼拜之内，从捕龙虾、爵士乐指挥，电视天气预报，甚至拉斯维加斯的婚庆服务，他都一一尝试。

sentences.sContent: The weatherman says we’ll have a cold spell before the end of this week.
sentences.sContent_eng: The weatherman says we’ll have a cold spell before the end of this week.
sentences.sCn: 天气预报员说,在这个周末之前,会有一阵子的冷天气。

words.tran: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打

trans.tranOther: a man on television or radio who tells you what the weather will be like
